title: Five League Cup shocks ahead of Bristol City's Carabao Cup clash with Manchester City
description: Bristol City have already knocked Manchester United out of the Carabao Cup this season but they face a huge task to upset Manchester City over two legs in the semi-finals.Â
content: If Lee Johnson and his team are searching for inspiration, they don't have to look far back through the competition's history to find some famous giant killings, though.Here, we pick out five stand-out shocks in the League Cup since 2000...
